callback_with_context.context_function_id: (cam_offset = ToVector4(3, 0, 0, 0), entries = Join(CampaignRoot.MilitaryForceList.Filter(CommandingCharacterContext.IsVisible && IsNotGarrisonForce && IsGarrisoned == false && FactionContext == PlayersFaction), CampaignRoot.SettlementList.Filter(IsVisible && FactionContext == PlayersFaction))) => { entries.Sort((CameraTargetPosition + cam_offset).Distance(Position), true).FirstContext.ZoomTo(-cam_offset) }

(cam_offset = ToVector4(3, 0, 0, 0), entries = Join(CampaignRoot.MilitaryForceList.Filter(CommandingCharacterContext.IsVisible && IsNotGarrisonForce && IsGarrisoned == false && FactionContext == PlayersFaction), CampaignRoot.SettlementList.Filter(IsVisible && FactionContext == PlayersFaction))) => { entries.Sort((CameraTargetPosition + cam_offset).Distance(Position), true).FirstContext.ZoomTo(-cam_offset) }

button_infect_target.componentleveltooltip: Infect the selected target to create the [[img:icon_plague]][[/img]]Plague directly upon one of your own [[img:icon_lord]][[/img]]armies or settlements, replacing any existing Plagues.

callback_with_context.context_function_id: CcoRtPlagueIngredient( Ingredient: Internal.StoredContextRequired("CcoCampaignPlagueIngredient"), AnySelection: Plagues.SelectedIngredientsList.IsEmpty == false, FullSelection: Plagues.SelectedIngredientsList.Size == Plagues.AllowedSelectionCount, IsSelectable: ((i = Ingredient) => Plagues.IsIngredientSelectable(i)) )

button_summon_cultist.componentleveltooltip: Summon a Cultist at the selected target to bring forth a [[img:icon_hero]][[/img]]Plague Cultist, who can only target enemies to spread the [[img:icon_plague]][[/img]]Plague they carry.

dy_plague_name.componentleveltooltip: When 3 symptoms have been selected, the Plague will be given a name.

callback_with_context.context_function_id: GetIfElse( Plagues.SelectedIngredientsList.Size != Plagues.AllowedSelectionCount, Loc("wh3_dlc25_plagues_error_symptom_count", Plagues.AllowedSelectionCount), GetIfElse( Plagues.TargetContext, GetIf(this.CanAfford(Plagues.CompositionAndTargetContext) == false, Loc("wh3_dlc25_plagues_error_cost")), Loc("wh3_dlc25_plagues_error_no_target")))

right.componentleveltooltip: Modify Plague factors at the cost of [[img:icon_infections]][[/img]]Infections

component_text.text: Select three to create a Plague.

trigger.trigger_property: run self.ChildList[1:].ForEach((c) => c.AnimationState.SetAnimation("growth", 0, false); c.AnimationState.UpdateAnimation(0); c.AnimationState.Apply(c.Skeleton))

run self.ChildList[1:].ForEach((c) => DoIf(c.AnimationState.Track(0).CurrentAnimationName != "shrink", c.AnimationState.SetAnimation("shrink", 0, false); c.AnimationState.UpdateAnimation(0); c.AnimationState.Apply(c.Skeleton)))
run self.ChildList[1:].ForEach((c) => c.AnimationState.SetAnimation("growth", 0, false); c.AnimationState.UpdateAnimation(0); c.AnimationState.Apply(c.Skeleton))
run self.ChildList[1:].ForEach((c) => c.AnimationState.SetAnimation("shrink", 0, false); c.AnimationState.UpdateAnimation(0); c.AnimationState.Apply(c.Skeleton))

holder_initial_state.componentleveltooltip: Plague Symptoms will be displayed here after selection

dy_plague_name.componentleveltooltip: When 3 symptoms have been selected, the Plague will be given a name.
